code: import{createBrowserRouter,RouterProvider}from'react-router-dom';import'./App.css';import{lazy,Suspense}from'react';import Layout from'./components/Layout';import Articles from'./components/articles/Articles';import Home from'./components/home/Home';import Article from'./components/article/article';import Signup from'./components/singup/Signup';import Signin from'./components/singin/Signin';import UserProfile from'./components/userprofile/UserProfile';import AuthorProfile from'./components/authorprofile/AuthorProfile';import ArticlesByAuthor from'./components/articles-by-author/ArticlesByAuthor';import{Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import ErrorPage from'./components/ErrorPage';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddArticle=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>import('./components/addarticle/AddArticle'));function App(){let router=createBrowserRouter([{path:"",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Layout,{}),errorElement:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorPage,{}),children:[{path:"",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{})},{path:"signup",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Signup,{})},{path:'signin',element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Signin,{})},{path:"/userprofile",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserProfile,{}),children:[{path:'articles',element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Articles,{})},{path:'article/:articleId',element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Article,{})},{path:'',element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"articles"})}]},{path:'/authorprofile',element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthorProfile,{}),children:[{path:'newarticle',element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Suspense,{fallback:"loading...",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddArticle,{})})},{path:'articles-by-author/:author',element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArticlesByAuthor,{})},{path:'article/:articleId',element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Article,{})},{path:'',element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"articles-by-author/:author"})}]}]}]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RouterProvider,{router:router})});}export default App;
